FROM_BENG: # Out of script characters are pass through
# Rewrite only Brahmic characters if they are mixed with Latin.
# Test Devanagari Eyelash Ra modern encoding and legacy encoding
# Chillus/Khanta TA with a preceding Virama
# Some Dhivehi words found online violate the `SUKUN` principle in consonant
# clusters. The following word `▐Ж▐ж▐Э▐░▐Й▐й▐Г▐к▐О▐з▐Г▐░▐С▐ж▐В▐░` cannot be rewritten by our grammar
# to the expected form `kas╩░m─лrug─Бrс╕Нan` because `SUKUN` is missing between
# `r` and `с╕Н`. The correctly behaving forms of the same can be found above.
